page.title: 03 THE RACECOURSE
page.content: Many years ago the Racecourse was used for horseracing. Nowadays it is used for sports activities such as football, tennis, cricket, hockey and rugby. Many people jog around the racecourse to keep fit. Sometimes Funfairs come to the racecourse and stay for several days at a time. A lot of tramps hang around at night. It is dangerous to walk through the racecourse at night because many muggings have happened there just recently. The Northampton American Footballers started training at the racecourse. It is one of the best play parks in my area and is close to the town centre and Northampton's Roman Catholic Cathedral on the Barrack Road. By Joseph Ginnelly of St. Mary's Middle School, Northampton.
